scripts.setup: git remote add upstream https://github.com/couchbaselabs/elasticsearch-transport-couchbase.git && npm run pull:all && git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.pull:capi:server: echo "--Pulling capi-server" &&  cd couchbase-capi-server && git pull
scripts.pull: echo "--Pull1ing origin" && git pull && echo "--Merging chages from upstream" && git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/master
scripts.pull:all: npm run pull:capi:server && npm run pull
scripts.build: npm run build:capi:server && mvn clean install
